muscles.name: Biceps
muscles.description: The biceps brachii is one of the most often trained muscles. stereotypically most guys want big biceps - and in practice, this is often true. As is commonly known, the main function of the biceps brachii is elbow flexion (what occurs during a curl exercise). However, the biceps have far more responsibilities than just curls.

grips.name: None
grips.description: No use of hands in the exercise.

force.name: Hold
force.description: Exercise which resists movement as opposed to inducing.

mechanic.name: Isolation
mechanic.description: Exercise trains a single body part.

correct_steps.text: Stand upright with your feet shoulder width apart.
Raise your arms out to your sides, bringing them up to shoulder level.
Rotate your palms so they are facing the ceiling.
Then, change direction and rotate the arms as much as you can.
